org.objectstyle.cayenne.gen
Class ClassGenerator

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.objectstyle.cayenne.gen.ClassGenerator
public class ClassGenerator
extends java.lang.Object

Class generation engine for ObjEntities based on Velocity templates . Instance of ClassGenerator is available inside Velocity template under the key "classGen".

Author:
Andrei Adamchik

Method Detail

bootstrapVelocity

public static final void bootstrapVelocity(java.lang.Class cl)
Configures ClassGenerator to load class templates using ClassLoader of a specified class. It is a responsibility of a class caller to invoke this method before ClassGenerator is used.

This method affects Velocity configuration when called for the first time, since Velocity.init() is done only once. Subsequent calls have no effect on ClassLoader behavior.

generateClass

public void generateClass(java.io.Writer out,
                          ObjEntity entity)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
Generates Java code for the ObjEntity. Output is written to the provided Writer.

java.lang.Exception

Returns class name (without a package) of the class associated with this generator.

setProp

public void setProp(java.lang.String prop)
Sets current class property name. This method is called during template parsing for each of the class properties.

getPropAsConstantName

public java.lang.String getPropAsConstantName()
Returns:
a current property name converted to a format used by java static final variables - all capitalized with underscores.
Since:
1.0.3
